titleStmt.title: The messengers preparation for an addresse to the King for a well-grounded peace. As it was delivered in a sermon, at Oxford, on Sunday, Novemb. 24. 1644. Before the commissioners of both kingdomes, the morning before their presenting the propositions to His Majestie. / By Samuel Kem, Batchelour in Divinity.
titleStmt.author: Kem, Samuel, 1604-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Austin, in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
